emptySectionList: No sections. Click the 'Add' button to create sections
emptyTargetList: No targets are defined. Select one or more components and click “Add Target” to add items.
failedToDeleteSelectedMeasurement: Failed to delete the selected measurement
failedToDeleteSelectedQuery: Failed to delete the selected query
noMeasurementSelectedText: Select a measurement from the 3D view.
noQuerySelectedText: Select a query from the 3D view.
proximityLabelText: Filter visibility to display parts only within the specified distance in {0}
getInvalidEditboxValueWarning: Invalid offset value. Valid values are between "{0}" and "{1}"
invalidCornerValues: Corner 1 value must be less than corner 2 value
invalidProximityValue: Proximity must be greater than or equal to 0
failedToMoveSection: Failed to move section to new location
showCapsLabel: Show Capping Faces for all Sections
createCutLinesLabel: Create Cut Lines for new Sections
Awv0GeometricAnalysisMeasureDesc: Calculate the minimum distances between the selected parts or features.
Awv0GeometricAnalysisQueryDesc: Display geometric information of the selected parts or features.
Awv0GeometricAnalysisSectionDesc: Create and manage sections used to clip portions of the 3D geometry in the 3D view. This allows users to view internal elements to expose conditions such as interference and clearance issues.
Awv0GeometricAnalysisProximityDesc: Search for and show all parts within the specified distance of the target parts.
Awv0GeometricAnalysisVolumeDesc: Search for and show all parts that intersect a volume with the bounding box of the target parts or a manually defined bounding box.
Awv0AnalysisSectionAddCmdDesc: Choose a section plane along which you want to clip the model.
Awv0AnalysisProximityAddCmdDesc: Add the selected components to the target list for spatial filter to determine the closest parts. Select a component not already in the target list to enable the Add Targets button.
Awv0AnalysisProximityRemoveAllCmdDesc: Remove all components from the target list.
Awv0AnalysisVolumnAddCmdDesc: Add the selected components to the target list to initialize the search volume used to identify the contained or intersecting parts. Select a component not already in the target list to enable the Add Targets button.
Awv0VolumeShowObjectCellDesc: View the properties of the object.
Awv0VolumeRemoveTargetDesc: Remove the component from the target list.
Awv0GeometricAnalysisQuery_scvDesc: Display geometric information of the selected parts and features.
partCheckDesc: Select Parts for Measurement and Queries
featuresCheckDesc: Select Features for Measurement and Queries
arcCheckDesc: Measure and Query Centers of Arcs and Circles
targetVolumeCoordinatesHelp: Volume is initialized based on the target list entries. Specify the minimum and maximum values for X, Y, and Z.
